description: Bergenia 'Silberlicht' SILVERLIGHT is an amazing plant species for the landscape due to its durability and its ornamental values. SILVERLIGHT produces grey-green foliage with striking silver veins, which glows in full sun. As well as offering dramatic colors and texture to a garden, it also tolerates some serious weather conditions with its strong and leathery foliage, making it an ideal choice for a low-maintenance garden. It produces large vibrant pink or white flowers during the spring, and offers additional evergreen foliage in the Winter months adding color to the land all year long.
